greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, A051731 * A054533 * transpose(A101688), provided A101688 is read as a square array.
formula: Triangle read by rows, A051731 * A054533 * A000012. A051731 = the inverse Mobius transform. A054533 = the lower left half of the Ramanujan sum table. The operation (* transpose(A101688)) takes partial sums of (A051731 * A054533) starting from the right. [Edited by _Petros Hadjicostas_, Jul 30 2019]
